pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, May 20, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Toronto, Ontario

6:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an armchair discussion at the Collision conference with the founder and CEO of BroadbandTV Corp, Shahrzad Rafati.

Enercare Centre – Centre Stage
100 Princes’ Boulevard

Notes for media:

  • Open to Collision-accredited media, on a first-come, first-served basis
  • Media must register at collisionconf.com/media.
  • Photographers and video crews should arrive no later than 5:00 p.m.
  • A livestream of the armchair discussion will be available.

7:25 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the co-founder and CEO of Collision and Web Summit, Paddy Cosgrave.

Enercare Centre
100 Princes’ Boulevard

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media wishing to cover this photo opportunity must RSVP by 1:00 p.m. on Monday, May 20 to media@collisionconf.com.
